name: A Cute Mess
description:
Controls

player 1:

  • movement: WASD
  • throw ball: E
  • make a sound: Q

player 2:

  • movement: arrow keys
  • throw ball: right shift
  • make a sound: /

Press space to continue to next level when won or replay level when lost

________

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Cheery Monday" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
